## [Survey Center on American Life](https://www.americansurveycenter.org/data/download-data/)

Added Fri Apr 28th, 2023

**What is this?****Excerpt from site:** The Survey Center on American Life makes its data available to the public after a period of six to twelve months.
Datasets are available to download as Stata and SPSS files.
Survey datasets are cleaned with all identifying information removed.

1.  Link to the datasets: <https://www.americansurveycenter.org/data/download-data/>
